attributes.additional_details: As crisp packets are sometimes mixed material they can't recycle it and you don't know what it it. Turtles could think it's a jellyfish and eat it and die!
attributes.background: Make the material from crisp packets eco-friendly or recyclable not as many are dumped in the sea

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for crisp producers.
